title: Abbakumovo, Vladimir, Vladimir Oblast
text:
Abbakumovo () is a <a href="types%20of%20inhabited%20localities%20in%20Russia">rural locality</a> (a village) in Vladimir, <a href="Vladimir%20Oblast">Vladimir Oblast</a>, Russia. The population was 25 as of 2010. There are 2 streets.
Geography.
Abbakumovo is located 16 km southeast of <a href="Vladimir%2C_Russia">Vladimir</a> (the district's administrative centre) by road. Shepelevo is the nearest rural locality.
